name: In the trenches
description:
in the trenches is a trench FPS game made for the 7DFPS game jam
warning: not very good, made on a deadline and i couldn't do much about the combat and making it much better

controls:
W A S D to move
mouse to look
left click to shoot
right click to aim down sites

after 3 waves, the day will end, and when you day
after you die you get a kill count
no sound
hope you enjoy what there is
